sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; export default class PersonalDataForm extends React.Component { constructor (props) { super(props); this.state = { name: '', nickName: '', email: '', field: '', position: '', } this.updateState = this.updateState.bind(this); } updateState (e) { const {name, value} = e.target; this.setState({[name]: value}) } renderSwitch () { switch(this.state.field){ case 'IT': return ( 'qwe' ); break; default: return(''); } } render() { return (
switch
Name:
{this.state.name}
Nickname:
{this.state.nickName}
E-mail:
{this.state.email}
Field:
{this.state.field}
Position:
{this.state.position}
) } }
